headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' https://maps.googleapis.com https://*.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https://maps.gstatic.com https://streetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com https://*.googleusercontent.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; connect-src 'self'; frame-src https://www.google.com https://maps.google.com; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'
